title: Mentor
welcome_description: Your lecturer is super busy lately, but you need extra practice. That's where Mentor comes in, ready to help you studyâ€”just like a TA.
readyfor_description: Prepare for your exams with Mentor.
features_topic_description: You can request practice questions based on the topic you want.
features_problem_description: Practice questions are randomized so you can get a wider range of problems.

answer_submit_title: Are you sure you want to submit?
answer_submit_message: You can't retake your answer until the next practice batch.
